DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether instill small amount liquid lidocaine uterus decrease pain felt woman laminaria insertion do cervical dilation prior second trimester abortion . The investigator hypothesize woman receive intrauterine lidocaine addition paracervical block experience less pain woman receive paracervical block .
DOC.criteria: Can sign informed consent Healthy pregnant female Weight 45kg Seeking abortion dilation evacuation second trimester pregnancy Gestational age 1424 week confirm clinic ultrasound Known allergy previous reaction lidocaine , bupivicaine anesthetic agent Known allergy previous reaction ibuprofen NSAID
